name: Lapses
description:
A minimalist one button game by Gaël Bourhis with music by Valerio Selig.

Lapses is an alternative take on the rythm-action genre : no menu, no scores and a seamless contemplative experience.

You're trapped in an endless circular motion an can only reverse your direction.

Colored shapes blend together and outline white areas that must be avoided to dive deeper.

Release note : Linux and OSX versions haven't been tested. Please send me an Email if you encounter any problem trying to play.
